last_episode_to_air.name: United We Stand
last_episode_to_air.overview: Dr Whitewood reveals the amazing truth behind Project Genesis. Jana fulfils her promise to come after Hartington.

name: Wolfblood
overview: Being a teenager is hard enough. Being a Wolfblood teenager is ten times more complicated. 14 year old Maddy loves her abilities - heightened senses, being faster, stronger and more graceful - but hates the secrets that come with them.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Schoolgirl Maddy Smith is a wolfblood, daughter of parents who turn into wolves at full moon, which will be her destiny when she is older. Surly new pupil Rhydian Morris arrives at Maddy's school. He has super-human strength when taunted and, when angry, involuntarily changes into a wolf. Maddy decides she must protect him, not just for his own sake but to stop him exposing her family's secret.

episodes.name: Lone Wolf
episodes.overview: Teenager Maddy Smith is hiding an extraordinary secret about who she really is. When new boy Rhydian turns up at school, Maddy's world gets a lot more complicated. Will he expose her for what she is - a wolfblood?

episodes.name: Mysterious Developments
episodes.overview: Rhydian and Maddy discover startling truths about other wolfbloods - but have they found out in time to rescue Shannon and Tom?

episodes.name: Family Ties
episodes.overview: A school project reminds Rhydian how alone he is without his own wolfblood family. When the exhibition is vandalised, suspicion falls on him. Can Maddy help him clear his name?

episodes.name: Cry Wolf
episodes.overview: Maddy is on the brink of her first full blown transformation and she's struggling to keep her powers hidden during a stressful time at school. Can Rhydian help her keep her secret?

episodes.name: Occam's Razor
episodes.overview: Maddy is stuck with her school mates on Lindisfarne island on the night of her first full moon transformation.

episodes.name: Maddy Cool!
episodes.overview: The power of Maddy's first full transformation still courses through her veins.

episodes.name: Dark Moon
episodes.overview: It's the day of the dark moon and Maddy and Rhydian have lost all their wolfblood powers.

episodes.name: Wolfsbane
episodes.overview: During a sleepover with her friends at Shannon's, Maddy is given wolfsbane and fails to control her inner wolf.

episodes.name: A Quiet Night In
episodes.overview: Rhydian agrees to spend the full moon in the den with Maddy and her parents.

episodes.name: The Call of the Wild
episodes.overview: Rhydian's past catches up with him and he has a big decision to make.

episodes.name: Eolas
episodes.overview: Maddy discovers a new wolf sense and can't get enough of it, but will this new obsession destroy her?

episodes.name: Caged
episodes.overview: It's a full moon and beast hunter Kyle enlists Shannon and Tom to help him track down the beast of Stoneybridge.

episodes.name: Irresistible
episodes.overview: Rhydian's brother shows up in town and Shannon gets hold of Kyle's wolf bait.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Schoolgirl Maddy Smith is a wolfblood, daughter of parents who turn into wolves at full moon, which will be her destiny when she is older. Surly new pupil Rhydian Morris arrives at Maddy's school. He has super-human strength when taunted and, when angry, involuntarily changes into a wolf. Maddy decides she must protect him, not just for his own sake but to stop him exposing her family's secret.

episodes.name: Leader of the Pack
episodes.overview: Rhydian returns to Stoneybridge, leaving Maddy and her family in danger. Tom finds out that Shannon has a surveillance camera hidden in the den.

episodes.name: The Girl from Nowhere
episodes.overview: An unexpected new arrival in Stoneybridge threatens to cause danger and chaos, and a jealous Maddy must choose sides.

episodes.name: Grave Consequences
episodes.overview: A forensic scientist threatens to unveil the wolfblood secret, as Liam boasts about his werewolf-slaughterer ancestors in a class project.

episodes.name: Total Eclipse of the Moon
episodes.overview: A lunar eclipse gives our Wolfbloods a chance to experience something new, and Shannon reveals a hidden talent.

episodes.name: Ancient Grudge
episodes.overview: After Alric returns, he has an ultimatum for Jana. Rhydian has a tough choice to make.

episodes.name: The Mottled Poppy
episodes.overview: Maddy, Emma, Daniel, Tom and Shannon end up being lured to a scary old house. Rhydian finds out something new about Jana.

episodes.name: Top Dog
episodes.overview: The feuds within the pack escalate when student elections are held, putting them all at risk.

episodes.name: Desperate Measures
episodes.overview: Jana is after Shannon's computer and Maddy must decide where her best interests lie.

episodes.name: Dances with Wolfbloods
episodes.overview: Maddy blames herself for Shannon's depression and hopes to make amends at the school disco.

episodes.name: Fall of the Wild
episodes.overview: On an orienteering trip, Liam, Maddy and Rhydian go looking for an old 'werewolf' lair.

episodes.name: Best of Both Worlds
episodes.overview: Ceri unexpectedly turns up at the caravan with extraordinary news for Jana - the young girl has become Leader of her Pack. What will be her choice?

episodes.name: Going Underground
episodes.overview: An exiled, frenzied Alric comes back looking for revenge. Maddy and Rhydian have to find a way to get rid of him. Meanwhile, Liam leads his friends back into the werewolf den.

episodes.name: The Discovery
episodes.overview: Doctor Whitewood gets Maddy's dad's DNA and she finds out about the wolfblood secret, Rhydian also asks Maddy on a date. Maddy and her family decide to leave the human world and go to Jana's pack to stay safe, leaving Rhydian, Shannon and Tom behind.

episodes.name: Ulterior Motives
episodes.overview: Rhydian, Shannon and Tom face a new future - and an old foe.

episodes.name: Alpha Material
episodes.overview: An unexpected arrival puts Rhydian's leadership skills to the test.

episodes.name: With Friends Like These
episodes.overview: Tom is accused of poaching, so Shannon becomes his romantic alibi.

episodes.name: Wolfblood is Thicker Than Water
episodes.overview: Rhydian is reunited with his father - but why has he really come?

episodes.name: The Dark Ages
episodes.overview: Sparks fly when some ancient wolfblood relics are discovered.

episodes.name: Who's Afraid of the Big Bad Wolf?
episodes.overview: Jana feels lost without her pack on a full moon.

episodes.name: Wolves Amongst Us
episodes.overview: Rhydian is determined to help Jana and Shannon follows her dream.

episodes.name: Dark of the Rune
episodes.overview: Rhydian and Jana mysteriously collapse when a comet appears.

episodes.name: The Cure
episodes.overview: Jana, Tom and Shannon go to Segolia where Tom makes a terrifying discovery.

episodes.name: The Cult of Tom
episodes.overview: Tom is out of control so Rhydian, Shannon and Jana turn to Segolia for help.

episodes.name: The Suspicions of Mr Jeffries
episodes.overview: Jeffries gets more than he bargained for when he follows Tom and his friends.

episodes.name: Cerberus
episodes.overview: The net closes in on Gerwyn, and help arrives from unexpected sources.

episodes.name: Jana Bites
episodes.overview: Jana Bites is a series of seven webisodes set between the second and third seasons of Wolfblood.

episodes.name: Captivity
episodes.overview: Jana's attempt to adapt to life in the city is thrown off course.

episodes.name: A Long Way From Home
episodes.overview: Jana's loyalties are tested when she discovers Segolia might be concealing evidence.

episodes.name: Morwal
episodes.overview: Jana's uneasy relationship with Imara is tested during a mission to find a dangerous wolfblood.

episodes.name: The Quiet Hero
episodes.overview: TJ tries to help Selina with a problem that threatens to expose her as a wolfblood.

episodes.name: She-Wolf
episodes.overview: With a Dark Moon looming, the pack is fraying at the edges and Selina's alter-ego is uncovered.

episodes.name: Sheep's Clothing
episodes.overview: When TJ falls for a human, he's in danger of breaking more than his heart.

episodes.name: Wherewolf
episodes.overview: Jana and TJ are forced to find Carrie to avoid their secret being exposed.

episodes.name: Into the Wild
episodes.overview: Jana's mission to the wild pack ends in disaster.

episodes.name: The Wild At Heart
episodes.overview: Jana must decide where she belongs.

episodes.name: Viral
episodes.overview: Jana's world crumbles and a face from the past returns.

episodes.name: Protocol 5
episodes.overview: Jana has to make a decision that will change the world forever.

episodes.name: Brave New World
episodes.overview: Jana makes the shock decision that this will be her last full moon in the city. While the pack wrestle with the disappointment of losing their alpha, TJ falls for the smoke and mirrors of movie producer Joshua Hartington.

episodes.name: The Once and Future Alpha
episodes.overview: The mystery wolfblood is unmasked and brings startling news from the Wild Pack. Jana summons the strength to help locate TJ, but her interference backfires with devastating consequences.

episodes.name: The Dawnus Torc
episodes.overview: The pack investigate the Segolia Vault and in doing so find the precious Dawnus Torc, which takes them on an adventure like never before. TJ falls sick with a mystery illness.

episodes.name: The Shadow in the Light
episodes.overview: Jana and Imara run into familiar faces as they track Hartington. Selina competes in the taekwondo fight of her life and in doing so makes an unlikely ally. Jeffries laments the end of his career.

episodes.name: Humans
episodes.overview: TJ's good intentions land him in hot water with Selina. The Humans group target the Kafe. A face from the past returns to take action that will change everything.

episodes.name: The Last Dark Moon
episodes.overview: Fantasy drama. It is dark moon day, and Katrina's grandfather has made the Kafe a wolfblood-free zone. Emilia's fate rests with Hannah, and Imara and Jana make a breakthrough in proving the conspiracy - but who can they trust?

episodes.name: Torn
episodes.overview: Jana and the pack ask Emilia to tread carefully now that they suspect government officials are conspiring with Hartington to chip and de-wolf wolfbloods. But Emilia has no intention of backing down and makes a public display of rebellion.

episodes.name: The One Who Sees
episodes.overview: Unable to help Selina's parents, Jana resolves to find a way to help the other trapped wolfbloods, starting with the Genesis Project. Matei returns to the den to seek Jana's help in convincing Emilia that her vision of Blydissiad is false.

episodes.name: The War with the Humans
episodes.overview: Jana is forced to realise that she can't save everyone and must make a decision about her future. TJ and Matei track Emilia but discover that Madoc is now pack leader. They join the journey to Blydissiad but are in for a shock.

episodes.name: United We Stand
episodes.overview: Dr Whitewood reveals the amazing truth behind Project Genesis. Jana fulfils her promise to come after Hartington.
